About the Company: Syncom Healthcare Ltd has presence in Pharmaceuticals Formulations which can be categorized in 4 broad categories i.e. Generic, OTC, Ethical and Herbal. The company manufactures a range of products such as Ethical drugs, Generic drugs, over the counter drugs (OTC) and Herbal formulations in various dosage forms and markets them under the trade mark Syncom which is a registered trademark in the name of Syncom Healthcare Limited. The company also undertakes contract manufacturing for large variety of pharmaceutical formulations for a number of other pharmaceutical companies of national and international repute such as Lupin Limited, Nicholas Piramal India Ltd, Galpha Laboratories Limited, Percos India Pvt. Ltd etc. (under their own brands) located in India.The company manufactures various dosage forms, which include tablets, capsules, eye/ear drops, ointment and creams and dry syrups.The Company is producing more than 130 products in Generic segment which includes CTZ, Profeed, Nimjet, Divoron, Gentijet, Ciprojet, etc.Apart from Generic, the Company has developed presence in OTC Segment. The Company is producing more than 40 products in this segment which include Fastac, Q-coril, Triple action, Pandrop, Syncom Gripe Water, etc.
